data.title: Project Management
data.text:
Range of activities:

1.Consulting services for a Lessee

Project management is one of the key elements for both a Lessee and a Lessor. Realizing our burdens and responsibilities, we offer comprehensive support for relocation processes and turnkey space finishing. We provide space arrangement, design and interior finishing services. We prepare schedules, budgets and work procedures, monitor their implementation while providing support consultancy services.

2.Consulting services for an Owner

As part of the Lessee's support services, we evaluate project intents and directives to ensure that they meet expectations and provide the best possible results in terms of time and prices. We negotiate and compare the scope of work and unit prices, but also suggest changes to help with their optimization. At the final stage, we take care of accepting works and removing any defects so that the space fulfills the customerâ€™s expectations in each field.

Benefits:

Experience

We work in many different fields and areas and we have unique experience and competences.

Saving time and money

Thanks to our knowledge and relevant schedule, we can achieve maximum results.

Security

We protect our client's interest at each stage of the process.
